description: Before unveiling the 2024 Budget in Parliament, Deputy Prime Minister Lawrence Wong shared its aims on his social media platforms. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Budget 2024: Shoring up support for citizens at each phase of life
title_page: Budget 2024: Shoring up support for citizens at each phase of life | The Straits Times
maintext:
Before unveiling the 2024 Budget in Parliament, Deputy Prime Minister Lawrence Wong shared its aims on his social media platforms.
“It is a Budget to keep Singapore moving forward, equip our citizens to realise their fullest potential and give more assurance to our families and seniors amidst a more troubled world,” he said.
